opening_theme: #1: "Nippon Cha! Cha! Cha! (ニッポン チャ！チャ！チャ！)" by Konpeitou (eps 1-10)
#2: "Koi shite Zoo (恋してZOO)" by Hiroko Kurumizawa (eps 11-20)
#3: "Hana no Run Run Power (花のランランパワー)" by The Mashin Brothers (eps 21-31)
#4: "Kobo-chan Glue (コボちゃんグルー)" by Kenji Ootsuki, Emmanuel 5, and Ikue Ootani (eps 32-42)
#5: "Ganbare Otoko no Ko (ガンバレ男の子)" by Ikue Otani (eps 43-63)
ending_theme: #1: "Yume no Okazu (夢のおかず)" by Cherish (チェリッシュ) (eps 1-20)
#2: "Shiroi Sneaker (白いスニーカー)" by Cherish (eps 21-42)
#3: "Ashita mo Aeru (明日も会える)" by Nami Hirai (eps 43-63)
